headline: ITW Schedules Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Webcast
summary: GLENVIEW, Ill., Jan. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE: ITW) will issue its fourth quarter and full year 2025 results on Tuesday, February 3, 2026, at 7:00 a.m. CST. Following the release, ITW will hold its fourth quarter and full year 2025 earnings webcast at 9:00 a.m. CST. To access the webcast for the event, please click on the following link:ITW Q4 2025 Earnings Webcast If you are a participant on the conference call, please dial 1-888-660-6652 (domestic) or 1-646-9
